bibl.title: Excavations on Geronisos Island: Second Report, The Central South Complex. Avec résumé en grec.
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 168-173: Amulets and the Archaeology of Ritual on Geronisos [western coast of Cyprus]. The objects include 1 fragment of an amphora bearing the incised letters ÉApollv( ) and several amulets presenting portraits of Ptolemaic rulers. <Apollo( )>
CONNELLY Joan Breton, Excavations on Geronisos Island: Second Report, The Central South Complex. Avec résumé en grec.
